title: OAI2LM OpenCode Provider Config (oai2lm.json)
description: Configuration file for @oai2lmapi/opencode-provider. Used by createOAI2LMProviderFromConfig() and createSettingsFromConfig().

apiKey.description: API key for authentication. Optional if OAI2LM_API_KEY is set.

baseURL.description: Base URL for API calls (OpenAI-compatible). If omitted, defaults to https://api.openai.com/v1.

name.description: Provider name used by the AI SDK provider (defaults to 'oai2lm').

headers.description: Custom headers applied to all requests.

modelOverrides.description: Per-model configuration overrides keyed by wildcard patterns (* and ?).

supportsToolCalling.description: Override whether the model supports native tool/function calling.

supportsImageInput.description: Override whether the model supports image inputs.

usePromptBasedToolCalling.description: Use XML prompt-based tool calling instead of native tools (reserved / forward compatibility).

suppressChainOfThought.description: Strip <think>...</think> blocks from output (reserved / forward compatibility).

captureReasoning.description: Capture reasoning content separately (reserved / forward compatibility).

thinkingLevel.description: Thinking level: token budget or preset (reserved / forward compatibility).

trimXmlToolParameterWhitespace.description: Trim whitespace in XML tool parameters (reserved / forward compatibility).
